channel.title: Larp
channel.description: http://larp.com is the biggest website of dorks i've ever seen, other than wOw (which not everyone online is a dork). But i saw some kids outside my school playing this, and so i confront them, and all they do is tell me they're playing larp (in this horrid english accent) and that mortals shouldn't join their "quarrell of sorts" or whatever they're saying. I really couldn't understand what they were saying but they gave me this fancy buisness card soooo i'm guessing they're official nerds. The point of this topic is just to discuss the uslesness of this dorkish game, and also to ask if it's fair for these newbs to take my smoking spot. My friend's so pissed that he's going over their right now to throw eggs and plastic water bottles at them. WTF?! [img]http://www.larp.com/images/larp3.gif[/img]

item.title: Larp
item.dc:creator: @rant rant
item.description:
@rant wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:45, topic:391830”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=488994.msg3578339#msg3578339 date=1303601637]

What I would like to do is have a gladiator match with those swords. Anything is legal except nut shots. Then you have judges and they pick who wins. Place bets and stuff. Seems pretty fun to me, I sure as hell would compete.

Now all we need is super jumping powers like those in final fantasy games so we can do epic slashing moves.

Japanese fighting games are messed up. Like seriously? Take on an army single-handedly? … Very unrealistic.
[/quote]

Just because it’s unrealistic, doesn’t mean it’s not cool. :)[/quote]
exactly, homefront is cool, but games are much different from real life.

Read full topic

item.title: Larp
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:38, topic:391830”]I can understand why kids do it, but 30+ years olds?[/quote]It’s a release.

Thanks to this thread, I’m now going to be at a LARP event from May 6-8 (it’s a 3-hour drive away). I’d always been interested in this, thought it looked fun, but never knew what it was called. It’s like a mini-vacation; the game starts Friday, lasts through Sunday (even in the night).

Read full topic

item.title: Larp
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:

I can understand why kids do it, but 30+ years olds?

Read full topic

item.title: Larp
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Roleplaying can be fun with friends, I used to do it at elementary school during recess. We didn’t wear costumes or anything though…

Oh yea! One of my best childhood memories was role playing with my brother and a friend at my house on our trampoline. We would pretend we magicians going through this training school. The trampoline let us do some pretty cool stuff, and it lasted for almost a year before he moved away… (again no costumes :P)

Read full topic

item.description:

item.title: Larp
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
item.description:
@Immortal_Technique wrote:

Sun Chips:

I sometimes run up to people and do the AGS special attack emote with a foam sword…does this count as LARP?

Sure.

Also, sometimes, I walk around my house and pretend I’m a Horde Rogue and act like I’m going to raid Stormwind.

Read full topic

correct, i’m assuming having no-life other than a pretend mid-eval wannabe contest has a dictionary meaning, allthough i may not be familiar with it. anyways im not raging on anybody, be who you wanna be im no hater.

item.title: Larp
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Now, if this was a job occupation, I’m sure some people would find it odd and “nerdy”, but it’s only a one day thing that occurs every once in a while. I guess it’s not “normal” to go out and have fun for a day.

Read full topic

item.title: Larp
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“rant, post:20, topic:391830”][quote author=Immortal Technique link=topic=488994.msg3575213#msg3575213 date=1303363389]
I professionally LARP. I’m the head of my camp in Charlotte.
[/quote][quote author=Slave Scyth link=topic=488994.msg3575323#msg3575323 date=1303375970]
I don’t see what’s wrong with this. It looks fun.

Now I’m looking for a chapter around my area in Ohio.
[/quote]
wow, lol i’m, sorry but… this is sad, get out while you’re still somewhat normal plz… for me… :’([/quote]You’re on an RSPS site. People don’t think that’s nerdy?

Not everybody acts like this LARPing is their entire life. It’s just a release. I don’t see what problem you have for people that do it.

Read full topic
